content: the slipped stitches give that extra thickness inside the mitten work 30 rounds like this or until your mitten reaches the top of the little finger when tried on you might like to compare the rough measurement of your knitting from the base of the thumb to mine at this point too to see if you need to add or subtract a few rounds small 6 5 cm / 2½ medium 8 cm / 3 large 9 cm / 3½ shaping the top round 1 *sl 1 k1 repeat from * to end round 2 ssk k18 k2tog twice 40 sts round 3 *k1 sl 1 repeat from * to end round 4 ssk k16 k2tog twice 36 sts round 5 *sl 1 k1 repeat from * to end round 6 ssk k14 k2tog twice 32 sts round 7 *k1 sl 1 repeat from * to end round 8 ssk k12 k2tog twice 28 sts round 9 *sl 1 k1 repeat from * to end round 10 ssk k10 k2tog twice 24 sts round 11 *k2tog repeat from * to end 12 sts round 12 *k2tog repeat from * to end 6 sts cut the yarn thread through the remaining six stitches pull the yarn tightly through to the wrong side and darn in the end now darn in the other two ends using the one at the base of the thumb to close any holes there that s the right hand mitten finished to knit one for the left hand follow the instructions above until you come to picking up the stitches for the hand at that point use the instructions below the left hand knit the 38 saved stitches from the holder and then pick up and knit eight more stitches from the base of the thumb arrange your stitches so that you have 22 on the first half of your needle and 24 on the second round 1 *sl 1 k1 repeat from * to the last 8 sts k1 sl 1 k1 twice sl 1 k2 round 2 k to the last 8 sts ssk k4 k2tog 44 sts you can now complete the left hand following the same instructions as for the right but the thumb position will have been reversed abbreviations st / sts stitch / stitches k knit p purl sl 1 slip one stitch in this pattern all slipped stitches are slipped purlwise with the yarn held at the back of the work m1 make 1 by lifting the thread before the next stitch and knitting into the back of it ssk slip slip knit see below k2tog knit two stitches together slip slip knit slip two stitches knitwise or knitwise followed by purlwise one at a time insert tip of left needle into stitches from above put yarn round right needle and knit both stitches together © frankie brown 2021 my patterns are for personal use only and should not be used to knit items for
